title: Scholarship?
content: It took forever to get 1st sem scholarship money but we did finally get it at the end of 2nd sem. So now that results are declared for 2nd sem, do we get scholarship again based on cgpa?

comments.body: You'll get CNR Scholarship based on your sgpa and MRD based on your cgpa.
